quizzes.question: What is the AppDelegate file's extension?
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]Review the Code[/h1]

The [b]project navigator [/b]displays all of the files in your project. If the project navigator isn't open, click the button on the far left end of the navigator selector bar. [img id="998" width="100%"]
If necessary, open the [b]MyApp[/b] folder in the project navigator by clicking the disclosure triangle next to it.
Select [b]AppDelegate.swift[/b].
Xcode opens the source file in the window's main editor area.
[note]Alternatively, double-click the AppDelegate.swift file to open the app in a [b]separate window[/b].[/note]

quizzes.question: What is the only property of the AppDelegate class?
